product_name: Arkansas River Guide: Granite To Canon City, Colorado
long_description: This guide contains a mile-by-mile description of Colorado's Arkansas River from Granite to Canon City. Author: Thomas G. Rampton. Softcover; 88 pages; full color photos and maps. Blacktail Enterprises; copyright 2006. Includes access areas where you can launch or take out. Geology of this region of the Rocky Mountain West: How did the river and these mountains come to be?. Topographic maps in color, with river miles, names of major rapids access areas and other landmarks.
short_description: This guide contains a mile-by-mile description of Colorado's Arkansas River from Granite to Canon City.
